title.en: Kantoku, Nekona Ore wa Dame desu ka

altTitles.ja-ro: Kantoku, Neko na Ore wa Dame desu ka

altTitles.ja: 監督、ネコな俺はダメですか

description.en:
Daichi enters the gay porn world as a model who plays tops and immediately gains popularity. However, he's actually an exclusive bottom who used sex toys on his ass every night!!!  
  
Although he dreams of playing a bottom role with Kouhei, the actor he admires, for some reason, he's very popular as a top. Of course he could never request to play the bottom…  
  
Living his life in frustration, one day he happens to meet director Sasakawa on set…who's actually his beloved Kouhei-kun!!  
  
- **Note:** Chapter 4 will not be scanlated due to licensed as a oneshot.
